channel.title: Compiler HELP!
channel.description: My compiler aint working..Always reads "You must have Java files for this compiler to compile". IM SO FRUSTRATED!!PLEASE HELP ME!i want to play on me server=/

item.title: Compiler HELP!
item.dc:creator: @nielzzzzzr nielzzzzzr
item.description:
@nielzzzzzr wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:4, topic:179762"][quote author=nielzzzzzr link=topic=240983.msg2041386#msg2041386 date=1202584210]

My compiler aint working…Always reads “You must have Java files for this compiler to compile”.
IM SO FRUSTRATED!!PLEASE HELP ME!i want to play on me server=/

Try this one

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
[/quote]

Are you fucking stupid?

die or die: Is it trying to compile in the right directory?[/quote]

Why ?

It works here =]

Read full topic

Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit [/quote]
